channel.title: Atari Arcade
channel.description:
[url]https://www.atari.com/arcade[/url]
Free browser versions of Atari classics such as Pong, Missile Command, Breakout, etc. with some graphical updates and online multiplayer with leaderboards.
Stumbled across it last night and I think it's pretty cool. You guys should take a look if you haven't already.
*If you use IE10, I think you will need a touch interface. Chrome/FF is normal keyboard/mouse controls.
